title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: self-hosted LLM runner with a simple CLI and REST API for running Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma, etc.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for the Ollama API—works in Node, Bun, Deno and browsers.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; pip install ollama gives synchronous and async APIs.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package for Ollama models (chat, embed, tool-calling).

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, model manager, RAG, multi-user).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with Android support and streaming chat.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for Ollama API (chat, embed, pull).

title: ollama-cli (go)
summary: Interactive Go CLI for Ollama with chat history and syntax highlighting.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns Ollama models into inline code copilots.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained C# / .NET client for Ollama with async streaming.

title: ollama-rs
summary: Rust crate for Ollama API with tokio streaming and strong typing.

title: ollama-chatbot-ui
summary: Lightweight Next.js chatbot front-end for Ollama with Markdown support.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models for generative QA and embeddings.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support.

title: ollama-docker-compose
summary: Official Docker Compose stacks for CPU and GPU (nvidia) setups.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Python sample showing RAG with Ollama embeddings and Chroma vector store.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Discord.py bot that streams Ollama chat replies into Discord threads.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Go-based Slack bot for Ollama with Bolt framework and streaming.

title: ollama-npm
summary: npm package page for the official Ollama JavaScript client.

title: ollama PyPI
summary: PyPI page for the official ollama Python client.
